DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand production trimethylamine-N-oxide ( TMAO ) metabolites dietary precursor find fish , eggs beef . In addition , study trace fate supplemental TMAO label deuterium determine TMAO use body .
DOC.detailed_description: Trimethylamine-N-oxide ( TMAO ) carbon-containing organic compound form dietary precursor include TMAO ( high fish ) , choline ( high egg ) carnitine ( high beef ) . However , TMAO production highly variable ( Zhang AQ et al. , 1999 ) , appear influenced genetics ( Cashman JR et al. , 2001 ) gut microbiome ( Wang Z et al. , 2011 ; Koeth RA et al. , 2013 ) , link heart disease cardiac patient ( Wang Z et al. , 2011 ) colorectal cancer among post-menopausal woman ( Bae S et al. , 2015 ) . At present , little know metabolic fate TMAO use within human body ( Bain MA et al. , 2005 ) . This study seek ( ) quantify effect egg , beef fish TMAO biomarkers plasma , muscle , urine stool ; ( ii ) examine metabolic fate supplemental TMAO label isotopically deuterium ; ( iii ) determine whether TMAO production function gut microbiome . To accomplish objective , randomize , control cross-over study conduct healthy male participant ( n=40 ) . The study incorporate four arm comprise study meal represent animal source TMAO ( egg , beef fish ) along fruit control . The study meal ( ) 3 whole hard-boiled egg ; ( ii ) 6 oz beef ( Philly-Gourmet Beef Patties ) ; ( iii ) 6 oz fish ( cod fillet ) ; ( iv ) 2 single-serve package Mott 's natural applesauce . Each meal serve one cup water , administer single day separate 1-week washout period . For fruit control , 50 mg deuterium-labeled methyl-d9-TMAO ( d9-TMAO ; Cambridge Isotopes ) add one cup water oral consumption enable trace metabolic fate TMAO , assess bioavailability clearance . Baseline blood sample obtain phlebotomist use standard venipuncture procedure , participant collect baseline urine sample . They also turn self-collected baseline 24 h urine stool sample . Following consumption study meal , serial blood sample collect 15 , 30 min 1 , 2 , 4 6 h , urine sample collect throughout 6 h study period . At 4.5 h , participant provide fixed fruit snack ( i.e. , applesauce ) water . On day participant consume d9-TMAO tracer , participant collect urine throughout next 24 h stool next bowel movement . In addition , subset group ( n=6 ) invite undergo muscle biopsy procedure 6 h fruit + d9-TMAO tracer consumption .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( main study ) : Healthy men age 2150 BMI 2029.9 kg/m2 willing comply study protocol ( consumption study meal sample collection ) Inclusion Criteria ( substudy involve muscle biopsy ) : Healthy participant able undergo watch medical procedure Exclusion Criteria ( main study ) : Men 50 age BMI â‰¥ 30 kg/m2 Women , vegetarian , smoker , individual gastrointestinal disease complaint , chronic illness metabolic disease ( include trimethylaminuria ) , abnormal laboratory value , take nutritional supplement , antibiotic probiotic within 2 month recruitment . Exclusion Criteria ( substudy involve muscle biopsy ) : Men history negative allergic reaction local anesthetic Tendency toward easy bleed bruising , medication may increase chance bleed bruising ( e.g. , Aspirin , Coumadin , Antiinflammatories , Plavix ) Currently immunosuppressive medication ( e.g. , glucocorticoid steroid , chemotherapy ) , disease pathology would impair heal process ( e.g. , diabetes , cancer , keloid , hereditary healing disorder , jaundice , alcoholism , HIV/AIDS )
